CustomField.formula: "&id=" + Id + CASE(RecordType.DeveloperName , 'Child_Performer_Services', '&templateid=a0nt0000000sArl' , 'Entertainment_Work', '&templateid=a0nt0000001be6B' , 'Janitorial', '&templateid=a0nt000000028Pd' , 'Car_Wash', '&templateid=a0nt000000028Pd' , 'Public_Works', '&templateid=a0nt000000028Pd' , 'Other', '&templateid=a0nt000000028Pd' , 'Contractor_Registration', '&templateid=a0nt000000028Pd' , 'Talent_Agency', '&templateid=a0nt0000002BFkm' ,'')+ "&defaultpdf=1" + "&queryid=[CW]a0mt00000019yiW?pv0=" + Id + "~pv1=" + Record_Type_Name__c + ",[JS]a0mt00000019yiR?pv0=" + Id + "~pv1=" + Record_Type_Name__c + ",[RegAccount]a0mt00000000sKz,[RegLocation]a0mt00000000sKx,[RegAttach]a0mt00000000sKy,[Manager]a0mt00000000sKt, [Trade]a0mt0000000J0uI " + "&congaemailtemplateid=a0lt0000000EWPD" + "&EmailAdditionalTo=" + Account_Email__c + "&EmailFromID=0D2t0000000Gmid" + "&qmode=SendEmail" + "&SC0=1" + "&SC1=Attachments" + "&OFN=License for " + License_Registration_Number__c
CustomField.label: Send New License - Date Change
